page.title: 15BIOLOGICAL CONTROL
page.content: The main pests that attack tomato plants are white and red spider and Buntings produce beneficial insects which control these pests.They have a unique production of insects and are the larest producers in the U.K._ 4,000,000 insects a week. Tobacco plants are grown,because of their big leaveas,these are placed in a glasshouse and in 4_5hrs they are covered by millions of white fly.The plants are moved to another louse where the white fly eggsnature for about 2 weeks.They are then moved to another louse where a very small wasp lays its eggs in the white fly eggs,so controlling the development of the white fly.These leaves are taken to the packingshed where they are cut into squares_100 eggs per square_which are mounted on card,packed and sent all over the world.
